participant_1.background:
I love to visit my mother in the afternoon and try on some of her shoes.
regular life disappoints me.
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
i love to take walks.
I like to drive my Honda around, but I have to be careful not to get stung by bees.

participant_2.background:
I am not comfortable sharing my weight.
I am close with my family and always have been.
My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there.
my parents pay my rent.
i like to make fresh pies.

content.text: Great! I'm making fresh pies for my family today.
Oh that sounds awesome! I love fresh pies.
I like apple pie the best.
Me too! My parents used to make apple pie every Thanksgiving.
That sounds amazing. I'm going to go visit my mom this afternoon and try on some of her shoes.
That's a fun idea! My mom and I are really close.
Me too! I don't get to see her as often as I'd like.
I'm lucky that she lives close by.
What's your most valued material possession?
My drum set. It's a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to Japan.
It's a beautiful country. I'm glad I got to spend some time there.
I'm sure it was an amazing experience
